enabled.name: Category Enabled
enabled.description: Enables command category on the server.

whitelist.name: Whitelist
whitelist.description: Allow usage of category only by these roles.

blacklist.name: Blacklist
blacklist.description: Disallow usage of category by these roles. Overrides whitelist.

whitelist.name: Whitelist
whitelist.description: Allow usage of command only in these channels.

blacklist.name: Blacklist
blacklist.description: Disallow usage of command in these channels. Overrides whitelist.

timeLimits.name: Command Time Limits (Channels)
timeLimits.description: Time limits for command in these channels. Format: N usages in M seconds.

amount.name: Amount of usages
amount.description: The command can be used this many times in the timespan in this channel.

time.name: Timeframe for usages
time.description: The command usages apply to this timeframe (seconds).

whitelist.name: Whitelist
whitelist.description: Allow usage of command only by these roles.

blacklist.name: Blacklist
blacklist.description: Disallow usage of command by these roles. Overrides whitelist.

timeLimits.name: Command Time Limits (Roles)
timeLimits.description: Time limits for command usage by these roles. Format: N usages in M seconds.

amount.name: Amount of usages
amount.description: The command can be used this many times in the timespan by the role.

time.name: Timeframe for usages
time.description: The command usages apply to this timeframe (seconds).
